title: DOES_ENTITY_EXIST
content:
0x7239B21A38F536BA0x3AC90869// DoesEntityExist
BOOL DOES_ENTITY_EXIST(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to check if it exists.Returns: Whether the entity exists or not.Checks whether an entity exists in the game world.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local currentVehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)

if DoesEntityExist(currentVehicle) then
    DeleteEntity(currentVehicle)
end
codeBlocks:
local currentVehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)

if DoesEntityExist(currentVehicle) then
    DeleteEntity(currentVehicle)
end

local entity = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for DOES_ENTITY_EXIST
DoesEntityExist(entity)
